title: Part 2: Book Preview with Mike Lynch + Q & Ace (ACS July 14)
itunes:title: Part 2: Book Preview with Mike Lynch + Q & Ace (ACS July 14)
description:
Mike Lynch joins Adam to chat about Adam’s new book, ‘Everything Reminds Me of Something: Advice, Answers...but No Apologies’, where Adam doles out advice and opinions with utter disregard for our politically correct, self-righteous, virtue signaling, woke times. They get into what the writing process was like, how the title changed, and how entire sections needed to be cut out. Adam takes questions sent in by fans. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

HyundaiUSA.com

Geico.com 

The Jordan Harbinger Show
